artist: Artist: Robert Mallet-Stevens; Publisher: Mourlot Freres, Paris
creditline: The Modernism Collection, gift of Norwest Bank Minnesota
description: church with rooster on top in yellow; bell tower with five bells; cross and 2 yellow angels on front; circular yellow windows (?) above 3 stained glass windows; on top of building behind tower "PATER NOSTI"
portfolio: From Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte, Pub.  Murlot, Paris 1987
signed: in plate UL corner, in black: [R. M-S.]; below image in margin, in black: [EGLISE]
title: Église, from "Une Cite Moderne, Dessins de Rob Mallet-Stevens Architecte"
